thread.section_title: Hotel Beacon - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location
thread.title_full: Excellent location - Review of Hotel Beacon, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: northlondonchap
title: Excellent location
text: Warm welcome from front desk, hotel a tad tired in parts, but perhaps things others may not notice. Location is fantastic, one of my favourite bits of the city and very close to the subway. First room we had - issue with smell in bathroom. Eventually rectified. Then an unwanted visitor in the bath (think it came in via shower). Eventually got moved to a suite on the 9th floor, not majorly better in terms of room quality, apart from some marginally upgrades and larger bathroom, but a generous gesture and much appreciated. My second stay at the hotel and would visit again.
